General.Name: Mister Spex SE
General.Description: Mister Spex SE provides eyewear products in Germany, Austria, Sweden, Switzerland, and other countries. It purchases and sells prescription glasses, sunglasses, and contact lenses. The company offers its products under the independent labels, own labels, and various premium and luxury brands through online shops and retail stores, as well as a network of partner opticians. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Berlin, Germany.
